subject: Return of order
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to use my right of withdrawal within the specified time window
and return the Simsonn Plus X pedals that I bought through your
online store.
Order number: #SSN3699.
Please send me the return instructions!

Thank you,
Enias

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

It's been more than 2 business days that no one has contacted me regarding
the return instructions.
Can you please do that for me? Order number #SSN3699

Thanks,
Enias

On Sat, Dec 6, 2025 at 3:17 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Enias Qurku,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. May I ask what issues you encountered with the product you received?

Hello,

There was no issue with the product. I just don't like it and I'm using my
right to return the product within the 14 day period.

Thanks,
Enias

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 1:05 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Enias Qurku,    Alright, you may return the package to our German warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. Please ensure the packaging remains intact and the product shows no signs of use; otherwise, the return request will not be approved.    Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089

Hello,

The package is on its way. Here is the tracking number: CA902246010AT.

Thanks,
Enias

On Tue, Dec 23, 2025 at 11:57 AM service@simsonn.com

Dear Support Team,

I hope you are well.

I am writing to kindly request an update regarding the status of my refund.
I returned the item as instructed, and I would like to confirm whether it
has been received and when I can expect the refund to be processed.

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to your response.

Kind regards,
Enias
